code: import axiosClient from"./axiosClient";const UserAPI={getAllData:()=>{const url="/users";return axiosClient.get(url);},getDetailData:id=>{const url="/users/".concat(id);return axiosClient.get(url);},postSignUp:query=>{const url="/users/signup/".concat(query);return axiosClient.post(url);},postLogin:query=>{const url="/users/login/".concat(query);return axiosClient.post(url);}};export default UserAPI;
